Patron of Art

He is credited with completing the Badami Cave Temples (Cave 4). An inscription there (578 CE) confirms his reign.

Civil War

He defeated the Kalachuris and conquered Revati island (Goa). Ultimately, he attempted to crown his son, leading to a rebellion by his nephew Pulakeshin II, resulting in Mangalesha's death.
